# 📚 Appendix: Resolving Merge Conflicts — A Practice Exercise

## 🛠 Setup: Start With a Clean Working Directory
(git status, clean workspace)

## ✨ Step 1: Create a New Branch
(git checkout -b feature-branch)

## 📝 Step 2: Edit a File
(edit and commit on feature-branch)

## ⬅️ Step 3: Switch Back to Main
(git checkout main)

## 📝 Step 4: Make a Conflicting Change
(edit same file differently and commit)

## ⚡ Step 5: Merge and Cause a Conflict
(git merge feature-branch)

## 🛠 Step 6: Resolve the Conflict
(manual resolution of conflict markers)

## ✅ Step 7: Mark Conflict as Resolved
(git add and git commit)
